@kasujja. Welcome,my pleasure,enjoyed the proding n extensive intervw-thanks!
I wish all my citizens good week.
When we were busy in the past days, I could not take the time to Twitter. There are questions on different topics. I want to answer some questions.
I get a lot of messages from the inside or outside about Egypt. I made my first statement on the days when the events began.
I will explain at the press conference that I will make my views on the new developments in Egypt at the airport tomorrow before going on a trip to Iran
There are a lot of messages about new health regulations. I have read them and I will discuss the problems with the Minister of Health.
The other day I watched the King's Speech filmini with my wife. It's a really beautiful movie.
I guess Filmin will talk a lot and get many awards.
There are also messages about traveling to Iran. Iran is a neighbor and a big country. The presidents have come to Turkey many times.
I will be on a return visit to your neighbors. I hope to share my observations with you after the visit.
From time to time you are requesting and requesting me via twitter.
If you write your requests on my website, I will follow it more easily. http://www.tccb.gov.tr/sayfa/iletisim/cumhurbaskanina_yazin/
Everyone wish good weekend.
